website_summaries.verdict: A well-known brand's original formula for gentle cleansing. Many users enjoy it so much they use it themselves as well.
pros: Great all-purpose cleanser with high foaming agents and added moisture
Its scent is a recognized fly repellent, which is a nice bonus for animals
cons: Not a concentrated formula, but a little still goes a long way

customer_reviews.title: Great For Bipeds and Quadrupeds Alike
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my border collie and my girlfriend loved the way it made his hair feel so much that she’s been stealing it for herself. I’d probably be using it too, but I’m bald. All around, highly recommended for the dog-beast and the she-beast in your life. My only suggestion would be to include a squirt top to make it a tad more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: G from OH

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a short haired guy and I use main and tail as my primary shampoo. With this massive gallon of it, it means can refill the 32oz and save money to boot. If this is your shampoo of choice then getting a big one to refill your smaller bottles should be a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: able_to_think

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT. I have really long hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my own hair. I don't own horses. I LOVE IT. I have really long hair. and it's hard to manage. I love how cheap this stuff is! I am able to get a whole gallon of quality shampoo and conditioner that will last me a long time. For those of you who have dry hair, you may want to add a touch of coconut oil to your ends. This shampoo and conditioner is great for a general clean! and will make your hair look great, But with my long hair the ends get really dry, So you may require a bit of extra moisture.
customer_reviews.author: GreenCowLand

customer_reviews.title: Makes your hair super shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using mane n tail for about a year and I have been getting so many compliments on how shiny my hair looks. I have recommended it to so many friends/family members and they all use it now too. To save on money and plastic I decided to start buying in bulk size to keep in a refillable bottle. I got the shampoo and conditioner together in this bulk size and they sent me a free gift sponge as a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: SB22809

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on sale for shampoo for my long hair. It’s pretty darn good shampoo for sure. I have “normal” hair where I can go a two days without my hair looking greasy. It really does a good job cleaning my hair, I can hear my hair squeak as I exit the shower. I would suggest if you have longer hair to use a conditioner on your hair to help with the tangles. I do towel dry my hair so that could also be bit of a factor with my tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Randall M. Wiley

customer_reviews.title: an old favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've been using M&T shampoo for years now but have had a bit of difficulty finding it in recent years. This gallon size should last me a year or more - problem solved! I love how it simply cleans my hair. Not a bunch of additives or scents - just clean, fresh-smelling hair. It does what it's supposed to and does it well. And this gallon size is an excellent value. Hopefully it will remain available.
customer_reviews.author: KingSimba

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my pit bull mix. I give her frequent baths due to going to the dog park on a daily basis. It smells great and doesn't seem to dry out her skin. I would recommend getting a pump for it though because the shampoo is thick and comes out thick. You can't just pour it into your hand because a lot comes out. I'll only buy this for my dog now because it's way cheaper than dog shampoo. I highly recommend (but definitely buy a pump for it for easy dispensing unless you're buying it to refill a current bottle).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 1 gallon size of Mane 'n Tail shampo
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo on my dogs for years! I've tried other kinds of shampoo too but I always come back to Mane 'n Tail! I ordered this large one gallon container. It was delivered very well wrapped and secure! No leaks possible :) If you've ever wonder about using this shampoo, it is great for humans too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not pour easily into a smaller bottle
customer_reviews.text: I got a small bottle of this shampoo to try and love the results, so I thought buying in a gallon, which saves money, was a good idea. Well it won't pour into the bottle I have without making a huge mess. Maybe if I had a funnel but I would have to buy one of those. Not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Works like it used to!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shampoo and conditioner and love them! I used them as a kid and it always left my hair shiny and manageable! I love Mane N Tail! It also doesn't leave an overpowering scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but plan ahead.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was one was open in the box and went every where. That's why I got two just in case. Other than that the open one still had a good amount in it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arnold Rowley

customer_reviews.title: 📍 ❣📍
customer_reviews.text: I have really curly hair and it works for me, but I do use both Shampoo and Conditioner from Mane 'n Tail. the only thing was, I didnt get my delivery on the date they said and it kept changing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerzeygirl809

customer_reviews.title: ThAnK YoU!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed buying different shampoo and conditioners. When I bought Mane 'n Tail in a grocery store. I thought every week how many I could purchase to fill an entire pantry shelf. I enjoy looking up products on Amazon. I am very happy I purchased this product. tHaNk YoU
customer_reviews.author: Angelagrace Caiazza

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs to smell better
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to was my dogs along with the conditioner. I wish it smelled "prettier". My dogs smell like a clean horse! :)
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewsader

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my dogs and sometimes myself. Makes my hair and the pups feel clean and not drying. Leaves a clean smell too
customer_reviews.author: Jkar

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: love mane and tail. I have hair down past my bottom and this keeps it healthy strong and sleek. I appreciate this product a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. I have curly medium fine hair and the shampoo doesn't make my hair feel greasy. It doesn't weigh down my curls either. I'm just giving it four stars because i wish it had a stronger smell of cleanliness. The shampoo smell fine, it just isn't very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo!!! Makes the dogs smell great and coat feel silky soft!! The price is great I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Have used this shampoo for years
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Have used this shampoo for years. Purchased in this size to save money and availability. Got tired of waiting on my usual vendor to restock. With this amount, I'll have enough for a long/long time.
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY FOREMAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product we've found for bathing German Wire Hair and "houndy" smelling dogs.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: this 2 in 1 is neigh-ing awesome! my rider uses it just as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: this 2 in 1 is neigh-ing awesome! my rider uses it just as much as i do and it keeps us silky smooth and looking fresh for rodeo day!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Scollan

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo for 20+ years as usual
customer_reviews.text: 5 girls using hair products gets expensive, this is a thick formula allows them to use less, and love the smell
customer_reviews.author: Amber Goepfert

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s like miracle grow for your head. Very satisfied with this product. I use it for dogs also.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne H

customer_reviews.title: Great for family use
customer_reviews.text: Always been a great product! And the amount you get here is perfect if the whole family uses it. Just whatever you do, never get it in your eyes! The burn is real...
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this shampoo! We have thick hair and this shampoo is perfect. It leaves our hair and scalp clean and it smells great. I was so thrilled and when I found the gallon size on Amazon for an affordable price. It arrived perfectly without any defects. It will last us a while anywhere between 6-8 months or more. I love that we can just refill our current shampoo bottles and traveling size bottles for any trips and the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Leyanis Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for my horses and dogs for years and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: class2canoe

customer_reviews.title: WILL LEAK IN TRANSIT
customer_reviews.text: I love Mane n Tail shampoo and i have a lot of hair so I figured it would be more economical to buy a big thing of it. Unfortunately, when it arrived it had leaked everywhere. The box was soggy and the bottle only about a quarter of the way full. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: ... on my dogs and it leaves there coat very nice and shiny and they smell great too
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my dogs and it leaves there coat very nice and shiny and they smell great too. LOVE THIS PRODUCT and bought a gallon after trialing this one. I definately recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: It lathers well. Washes good. Helps my hair grow. Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Arlyn Torres

customer_reviews.title: Hair feels clean
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally Oily hair and this makes my hair feel great and strong! I use a different conditioner and don't think its necessary to use the Mane n Tail conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good product good price
customer_reviews.text: I bathe our 5 dogs regularly with this brand. Works well, enough suds, easily rinses off, does not irritate their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to know that the product comes in this size.
customer_reviews.author: MSW2017

customer_reviews.title: Love the cleanliness
customer_reviews.text: This helps thicken your hair while washing. I do use this and the conditioner as well
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Parks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shampoo on the market. Keeps my beard epic and Viking God like
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Do they make a bigger size? Have reordered.
customer_reviews.text: Husband has skin issues and this product soothes his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schlie

customer_reviews.title: The bottle's seal fell off when I opened it the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle's seal fell off when I opened it the first time. The shampoo's scent is weaker compared to the one I bought from another seller before, which leads me to believe that the quality of this shampoo is sub-par. It does not provide a lather as thick as I would expect from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: ABuyer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: 3, one gallons I received. All arrived damaged, not sealed ... shampoo EVERYWHERE. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tia H.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works on thick hair and great for dog hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was leaked
customer_reviews.text: We love this product, but the bottle cap was not closed tightly so we received the package soaked inside. Please make sure cap closed tightly or seal it.
customer_reviews.author: MI-CHIN

customer_reviews.title: There is no better dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my dogs. There is no better dog shampoo. If I had a horse I'd use it on him too.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz The Cat

customer_reviews.title: help my hair grow
customer_reviews.text: I have fine and less hair. After using this shampoo, my hair grows more, faster and stronger. I love it very much. will continue to use for long time.
customer_reviews.author: jemy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I always used Main and Tail shampoo on my horses years ago, and used it for myself too. Now I love using it on my dogs, and still use it myself! A good product and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nutsfordogs

customer_reviews.title: Dog grooming aide
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is fantastic. However, the bottle leaked a little during shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A great deal, works well for human use
customer_reviews.text: A great deal, works well for human use. Gets your hair really clean. I like that this does not have a built in conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Y.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Been using this shampoo for years on the dogs ,love it , just needed to step up to bigger jug
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M..

customer_reviews.title: Buy the gallon
customer_reviews.text: I love this I don’t have to keep buying shampoo so often!
customer_reviews.author: glidiany vallejo

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommends it to me. The portion is really generous. Can't wait to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 2 dogs. It’s thick so I do half water and half shampoo and then it sprays out well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Broughton

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo ever - Straight Arrow Mane/Tail Shampoo for Horses
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for a long time now. Since it is no longer carried by the grocery stores that I used to purchase it in, I was thrilled to find it online, especially in a gallon size (now I don't have to worry about running out of the shampoo anytime soon). I received it in a few days (faster than I expected).
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Fillat

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo for people too!
customer_reviews.text: We love this shampoo as it's gentle on people hair too. I was thrilled to find it in a gallon size too. That will last us quite awhile. It has a nice scent too. And my kids aren't allergic to it. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie Kitty

customer_reviews.title: The product works!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this product. To find it in a gallon jug is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Neigh!
customer_reviews.text: Saves me money. It was not in a round gallon size in the picture. I received a rectangular one. Still the same stuff.
customer_reviews.author: TheFox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo, and with the pricetag, it's good for the family...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mondello

customer_reviews.title: Use on Dogs
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is great for Poms. It is easy to wash out of their hair and keeps it from matting and tangling. It give the hair a shine and makes it soft.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This product is a great catchall for anyone with pets of any size
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great catchall for anyone with pets of any size. We use ours for our dogs, cats, and in a pinch, for ourselves. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Mane and Tail for years and have found it to be the best shampoo for my hair type. I have incredibly thick and fine hair and am prone to dandruff and this shampoo cleans my hair without any of the usual buildup from dandruff shampoos and leaves it shiny and soft. This container in particular is not the best deal, but when you have hair halfway down your back it helps to have a bulk supply of shampoo on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Arcocha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This I have been using for my pets for years
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: It's really soft but don't think my hair is growing ...
customer_reviews.text: It's really soft but don't think my hair is growing any faster it is thick and goes a long way

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! Smells great makes my hair look great and shiney, also makes it grow fast
customer_reviews.author: Mini

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: Been using this shampoo for years. I will never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: lynda

customer_reviews.title: I love Mane n Tail Shampoo and Conditioner for my horse ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Mane n Tail Shampoo and Conditioner for my horse because it detangles and leaves his mane and tail clean and silky.
customer_reviews.author: 808pugs

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: I personaly love this product and even better that it comes in a gallon size. However upon arrival and opening the box it came in . it had spilled all over what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely bright warm light
customer_reviews.text: Awesomely bright! Warm light so much better than florescent and less energy no worries about environmental pollution.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Sorry we did fine  shampoo that was delivered on March 11th.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I did received the shampoo on 3/11. Thank you. visentah@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: VH

product_meta.title: Mane 'n Tail and Body Shampoo 1 Gallon
product_meta.description: An exclusive formula containing high lathering cleansing agents fortified with moisturizers and emollients. Safe for use on all animals and humans too. For best results follow with Mane 'n Tail Conditioner.
feature_bullets: Rich fragrant lather provides “down to the skin” cleansing action, perfect for getting out all dirt and debris, without stripping natural oils.
A gentle pH balanced formula provides optimum body, shine and manageability
Micro-enriched protein formula fortified with moisturizers and emollients that condition leaving coat, mane and tail soft and shiny.
Regular use enhances coat health and appearance
